thread.title: EU regulators to decide on $73 bln Shell, BG deal by Sept. 2
thread.title_full: EU regulators to decide on $73 bln Shell, BG deal by Sept. 2

title: EU regulators to decide on $73 bln Shell, BG deal by Sept. 2
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Jul 30, 2015, 18:50 BST - UK Markets closed EU regulators to decide on $73 bln Shell, BG deal by Sept. 2 Reuters - UK Focus – 6 minutes ago 1,861.00 +84.00 
BRUSSELS, July 30 (Reuters) - European Union antitrust regulators will decide by Sept. 2 whether to approve Royal Dutch Shell (LSE: RDSB.L - news ) 's planned 47 billion pound ($73.25 billion) buy of BG Group (LSE: BG.L - news ) to become the world's top liquefied natural gas company. 
The European Commission said the Anglo-Dutch company sought approval on Wednesday. It can extend its review by 10 working days in the event Shell offers concessions or open a four-month-long full-scale investigation if the company cannot allay competition concerns. 
The deal, which will help Shell compete better with world No. 1 oil major ExxonMobil, has already received the green light from regulators in the United States, Brazil and South Korea. 
($1 = 0.6416 pounds) (Reporting by Foo Yun Chee; editing by Susan Thomas) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
